name: Going Outside Simulator 2
description:
Arrow Keys or WASD to move around

Spacebar to jump

Left Shift or Enter to pick highlighted things up and let go

F to enable/disable fullscreen, Esc to pause

The downloadable version is much smoother and highly recommended, you can download it below.

Update 1.01: A few small things I forgot. No more random fence and no more underground cars.

Leave a comment if you have feedback or anything is broken!
